ValidationRule.description: Discontinuation of Planning: Withdrawn Request Status
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL(Type,"Discontinuation of Planning: Withdrawn Request"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status,"Awaiting Forms")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status,"Follow up required for CC Review/Checks")),NOT(ISPICKVAL(X1632__c,"Yes")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Not all forms have been received (Form 1632), status can only be set to Awaiting Forms or Follow up required for CC Review/Checks
